QuestData.Title: Stonedark Crystal
QuestData.Description:
Without my crystalline focus, my powers are weak. Those who captured me took it, and I know not where it is now.
I'm sure one of the Feltotem has it. If you find it, please return it to me.
QuestData.CompletionText: I have power over the earth without my crystal, but my power is much greater with it than without.
QuestData.RewardText: This will help me repair my broken body.
